Not to mention that Edison never built his spirit phone. =C2=A0He only th=
eorized that such a device *could* be built. =C2=A0People really need to do=
 15 mins worth of research before naming these things :))

Don

For the rec=
ord, I correct everyone around me that call them=C2=A0anything=C2=A0but Fra=
nk's box.

=C2=A0 
1=
-Calling an Edison box is sham and scam. A way of trying to lend credbility=
 to it, and remove me from box history, and it does look suspicioulsy like =
what I make. It is also ignoring all EVI-ITC history of the last one hundre=
d years. How many here realize the ghost box, or radio sweep method used to=
 be called Direct Radio Voice, and has long history? I have never heard any=
 stories of Edison getting radio contacts wioht spirit.
How many have even =
done five minutes of research on the history of EVP. I can tell ya, none! N=
o, y'all want to sit in the dark and ask what color your shirt is then clai=
m to be great researchers and experts. 

2-I doubt that it truely random, I=
'd like to see a scope vid of the sweep modes. 

I wouldn't have problem, b=
ut these people like the one putting on this video belittle and insult me i=
n public. For what? For their own fame and fortune. Then try to copy Chirs =
Moon, and blame the concept on Edison--freaking clueless, all of you!

--- =
